name: Game about Moyai (Moyai Game Recreation)
description:
THIS IS A RECREATION OF MOYAI GAME BY IMBread2391 https://gamejolt.com/games/moyai-game/661622

in this game you play as jim idiot, and you have to worship rob the moyai

you have to eat berrys so you dont die

and drink from the river so you dont die

and worship rob so you dont die
